scouting.name: Scouting
scouting.description: Ability to notice hidden dangers, track enemies, and survey terrain.

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.description: Following trails and identifying the presence of creatures in the area.

navigation.name: Navigation/Pathfinding
navigation.description: Ability to find the shortest or safest path through a known area.

swimming.name: Swimming
swimming.description: Ability to traverse deep water without drowning.

climbing.name: Climbing
climbing.description: Ability to ascend steep or treacherous surfaces.

running.name: Running
running.description: Increases overland travel speed and reduces fatigue.

foraging.name: Foraging
foraging.description: Locating edible or useful natural resources in the wilderness.

cooking.name: Cooking
cooking.description: Preparing meals that grant temporary bonuses or improved healing.

weaponsmithing.name: Weaponsmithing
weaponsmithing.description: Crafting and repairing metal melee weapons.

bowery.name: Bowery
bowery.description: Crafting and repairing bows and crossbows.

fletching.name: Fletching
fletching.description: Crafting arrows and bolts for missile weapons.

herbalism.name: Herbalism
herbalism.description: Gathering and identifying rare or medicinal plants.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Extracting raw ore and stone from deposits.

engineering.name: Engineering
engineering.description: Designing and constructing complex mechanical devices or repairs.

leatherworking.name: Leatherworking
leatherworking.description: Tanning hides and crafting leather armor and goods.

jewelcrafting.name: Jewelcrafting
jewelcrafting.description: Cutting gems and crafting jewelry (potentially magical).

skinning.name: Skinning
skinning.description: Successfully harvesting hides and pelts from dead creatures.

reading_writing.name: Reading/Writing/Scribing
reading_writing.description: Literacy; fundamental to research and spell acquisition.

monster_lore.name: Monster Lore (Identification)
monster_lore.description: Knowledge of a creature's strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

item_lore.name: Item Lore
item_lore.description: Identifying the properties of unknown items, magical or otherwise.

oratory.name: Oratory
oratory.description: Public speaking skill for rousing crowds or giving formal speeches.

negotiation.name: Negotiation/Merchant
negotiation.description: Ability to haggle for better prices in trade.

trap_management.name: Trap Management
trap_management.description: Ability to detect, disarm, or set traps.

lockpicking.name: Lockpicking
lockpicking.description: Opening locked doors and containers without a key.

pickpocketing.name: Pickpocketing
pickpocketing.description: Stealing small items from a person without being noticed.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics (Tumbling, Evasion)
acrobatics.description: Performing complex physical maneuvers; grants evasion in combat.

stealth.name: Stealth (Hiding in Shadows)
stealth.description: Moving undetected and gaining advantage in combat.

riding_taming.name: Riding/Taming (Horses)
riding_taming.description: Ability to ride, control, and train mounts.
